location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting the extract of a letter from the Court of Directors dated 6 September 1813, containing directions for the observance of vigilance in the due realization of the revenues and in the retrenchment of expenses.
